title: A day in the life of a concert roadie
text:
A day in the life of a concert roadie

13 Mins Ago

To view this site, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser, and either the Flash Plugin or an HTML5-Video enabled browser. Download the latest Flash player and try again.

We spent a day in the life with Eric Hillman, who is a roadie for multiple rock bands that travel across the world. During our time with him at The Met in Philadelphia, we had an all-access pass behind the scenes peak at what he does throughout the day before the rock band 311 hits the stage. Here's what it's like to be a concert roadie.
